meanings.definition: A type of fabric made from cotton or wool.
meanings.sent1: I love the soft feel of duvetyns against my skin.
meanings.sent2: She bought a beautiful dress made of duvetyns for the party.
meanings.sent3: The duvetyns whispered secrets to each other in the quiet room.
meanings.sent4: The duvetyns of the night sky wrapped the world in a cozy embrace.
meanings.sent5: The duvetyns rustled gently in the breeze, creating a soothing sound.

meanings.sent1: The shop had a variety of duvetyns in different colors.
meanings.sent2: She collected duvetyns of various textures for her sewing projects.
meanings.sent3: The duvetyns on the shelf seemed to be having a party of their own.
meanings.sent4: The duvetyns on the bed piled up like a mountain of softness.
meanings.sent5: The duvetyns in the store window beckoned customers with their cozy allure.
